title: Maven Version Generator
description: Bump version for projects with pom.xml or package.json

specifier.description: The semver version specifier to use (e.g., 'patch', 'minor', 'major', or an explicit version)

preid.description: The prerelease identifier to use when versioning a prerelease

packageRoot.description: The root directory of the package (supports {projectRoot} interpolation)

currentVersionResolver.description: How to resolve the current version of the package
